title: Journalism starts obsessing over something other than trust
description: We’re obsessed with trust in journalism. How do we get it? How did we lose it? How can we rebuild it? These are all important questions — questions that drive my own research on the fundamentals and dynamics of trusted spaces and how we might reconnect communities with journalism. But is trust really the only...
